sentences.en: Anyway, I soon got on the blower to him.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，我立马给他去了电话。

sentences.en: Attaching the blower, dust separation plant , recycle directly, no need the operator.
sentences.cn: 附加小型吹风机 、 粉尘分离装置, 直接回收, 不经人手.

sentences.en: Get Jones on the blower for me.
I found him to be organ - blower to all the people.
sentences.cn: 我发现他对谁都大吹大擂.

sentences.en: Improved design and application of dust blower could prevent the corrosion.
sentences.cn: 同时提出,更新设计和采用ESW激波吹灰器是预防腐蚀的有效措施.

sentences.en: In enter - pool before, want to start air - blower above all, generate air stream.
sentences.cn: 在进入“游泳池”前, 首先要将 鼓风机 启动, 产生气流.

sentences.en: Kexing Automatic Temperature Controller: designed for blower fan automatic temperature control.
sentences.cn: 详细介绍科星全自动温度控制器: 用于对风机的温度自动控制.

sentences.en: Such as baking oven or electric blower without any organic contamination.
sentences.cn: 如不产生任何有机污染的局炉或热吹风.

sentences.en: The Harman Centre should act as a whistle blower.
sentences.cn: 哈曼艺术中心则应该担当告密者的角色.

sentences.en: The large type blower fan is lateral arranged on the capacity space.
sentences.cn: 一鼓风式大形风扇,其侧向固定于上述容置空间上.

sentences.en: The machine is consisted of host, blower, analyzer, powder and filter components.
sentences.cn: 整机由主机 、 风机 、 分析器 、 集粉器、除尘器等部分组成.

sentences.en: The manager is angry about a whistle - blower among the workers.
sentences.cn: 经理对工人之中有打小报告的人感到生气.

sentences.en: Weber slammed the blower shut angrily, obviously disappointed at something.
sentences.cn: 韦伯生气地把吹风机砰地一声关上, 显然什么东西让他很失望.

sentences.en: You can always get me on the blower.
sentences.cn: 你随时打电话都能找到我.

sentences.en: You may adjust the air blower nozzle in accordance with your need.
sentences.cn: 你可以根据需求调整通风孔.
